message.content: Caveat: The messages below were generated by the user while running local commands. DO NOT respond to these messages or otherwise consider them in your response unless the user explicitly asks you to.

currently when i switch from light to dark mode there are several places where the dark theme is not applied correctly. e.g. when i go back from the appearances setting (where I make the change from light to dark) the background color of the settings page is still light. if i go to a page where dark theme is mostly correct like news fragment the notification bar is still light. on saved and search pages the main area of the page, i.e. between the toolbar and the bottom bar is light. why are these elements not switching themes correctly? ultrathink

content.thinking:
The user is asking about issues with theme switching in their Android app. They mention several specific areas where the dark theme is not being applied correctly:

1. Settings page background remains light when returning from appearance settings
2. Notification bar stays light in news fragment even when dark theme is mostly correct
3. Main content area (between toolbar and bottom bar) stays light on saved and search pages

This sounds like a theming issue in an Android app. I should investigate the codebase to understand how theming is implemented and identify why these specific elements aren't switching properly.

Since I'm in plan mode, I should:
1. Research the current theming implementation
2. Identify the root causes of these specific issues
3. Present a comprehensive plan to fix them

Let me start by exploring the codebase to understand the theming structure.

content.text: I'll help you investigate the theme switching issues. Let me examine the codebase to understand how theming is implemented and identify why certain elements aren't switching correctly.

input.description: Research theming implementation
input.prompt:
I need to understand how theming is implemented in this Android app. The user is experiencing issues where some UI elements don't switch from light to dark theme correctly, specifically:

1. Settings page background stays light when returning from appearance settings
2. Notification bar stays light in news fragment 
3. Main content area stays light on saved and search pages

Please search through the codebase to find:
1. How themes are defined (look for styles.xml, themes.xml, colors.xml files)
2. How theme switching is implemented (look for theme application code, preference handling)
3. The specific fragments/activities mentioned: settings, news fragment, saved pages, search pages
4. Any theme-related code in MainActivity or base activities
5. How the status bar/notification bar theming is handled
6. Any recent changes to theming code

Focus on understanding the architecture and identifying potential root causes for these theming issues.

<resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">

    <style name="Theme.OSRSWiki" parent="Theme.Material3.DayNight.NoActionBar">
        <item name="android:windowActivityTransitions">true</item>
        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/osrs_brown_deep</item>
        <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/osrs_text_light</item>
        <item name="colorPrimaryContainer">@color/osrs_parchment_medium</item>
        <item name="colorOnPrimaryContainer">@color/osrs_text_dark</item>
        <item name="colorSecondary">@color/osrs_gold</item>
        <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/osrs_brown_deep</item>

1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.theme
     2
     3import androidx.annotation.StringRes
     4import androidx.annotation.StyleRes
     5import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.R // Make sure R is imported from your app's package
     6
     7// Represents the available themes in the application.
     8// Each theme has a marshalling ID for storage, a string tag, its Android style resource ID,
     9// and a string resource ID for its display name.
    10enum class Theme(
    11    val marshallingId: Int,
    12    val tag: String,
    13    @StyleRes val resourceId: Int,
    14    @StringRes val nameId: Int
    15) {
    16    OSRS_LIGHT(0, "osrs_light", R.style.Theme_OSRSWiki_OSRSLight, R.string.theme_name_osrs_light),
    17    OSRS_DARK(1, "osrs_dark", R.style.Theme_OSRSWiki_OSRSDark, R.string.theme_name_osrs_dark);
    18
    19    fun isDark(): Boolean {
    20        return this == OSRS_DARK
    21    }
    22
    23    // Add other helper properties if needed, e.g., isLight, isParchmentBased, etc.
    24
    25    companion object {
    26        // The default theme to fall back to if no preference is set or an invalid one is found.
    27        // OSRS_LIGHT will be the app's default light theme.
    28        val DEFAULT_LIGHT = OSRS_LIGHT
    29        // OSRS_DARK will be the app's default dark theme (when chosen by user or system if DayNight without specific selection).
    30        val DEFAULT_DARK = OSRS_DARK
    31
    32        fun ofMarshallingId(id: Int): Theme? {
    33            return entries.find { it.marshallingId == id }
    34        }
    35
    36        fun ofTag(tag: String): Theme? {
    37            return entries.find { it.tag == tag }
    38        }
    39    }
    40}

1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki
     2
     3import android.content.Intent
     4import android.os.Bundle
     5import android.util.Log
     6import androidx.activity.OnBackPressedCallback
     7import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
     8import androidx.core.view.ViewCompat
     9import androidx.core.view.WindowInsetsCompat
    10import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    11import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.activity.BaseActivity
    12import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.databinding.ActivityMainBinding
    13import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.history.HistoryFragment
    14import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.navigation.AppRouterImpl
    15import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.readinglist.ui.SavedPagesFragment
    16import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.search.SearchActivity
    17import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.search.SearchFragment
    18import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.ui.main.MainFragment
    19import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.ui.map.MapFragment
    20import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.ui.more.MoreFragment
    21import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.log.L
    22import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.FontUtil
    23import android.widget.TextView
    24
    25class MainActivity : BaseActivity() {
    26
    27    private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding
    28    private lateinit var appRouter: AppRouterImpl
    29    private lateinit var mainFragment: MainFragment
    30    private lateinit var mapFragment: MapFragment
    31    private lateinit var historyFragment: HistoryFragment
    32    private lateinit var savedPagesFragment: SavedPagesFragment
    33    private lateinit var moreFragment: MoreFragment
    34    private lateinit var activeFragment: Fragment
    35
    36    companion object {
    37        const val ACTION_NAVIGATE_TO_SEARCH = "com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.ACTION_NAVIGATE_TO_SEARCH"
    38        private const val MAIN_FRAGMENT_TAG = "main_fragment"
    39        private const val MAP_FRAGMENT_TAG = "map_fragment"
    40        private const val HISTORY_FRAGMENT_TAG = "history_fragment"
    41        private const val SAVED_PAGES_FRAGMENT_TAG = "saved_pages_fragment"
    42        private const val MORE_FRAGMENT_TAG = "more_fragment"
    43        private const val ACTIVE_FRAGMENT_TAG = "active_fragment_tag"
    44    }
    45
    46    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
    47        enableEdgeToEdge()
    48        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
    49        binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
    50        setContentView(binding.root)
    51        L.d("MainActivity: onCreate: ContentView set.")
    52
    53        // Handle system window insets to avoid content overlapping with status bar
    54        ViewCompat.setOnApplyWindowInsetsListener(binding.navHostContainer) { view, insets ->
    55            val systemBars = insets.getInsets(WindowInsetsCompat.Type.systemBars())
    56            // Only apply top and side padding to avoid overlapping with status bar
    57            // Bottom padding is handled by the constraint layout (bottom nav creates the gap)
    58            view.setPadding(systemBars.left, systemBars.top, systemBars.right, 0)
    59            insets
    60        }
    61
    62        appRouter = AppRouterImpl(supportFragmentManager, R.id.nav_host_container)
    63        L.d("MainActivity: onCreate: AppRouter initialized.")
    64
    65        if (savedInstanceState == null) {
    66            L.d("MainActivity: onCreate: savedInstanceState is null, setting up initial fragments.")
    67            
    68            // Create new fragment instances
    69            mainFragment = MainFragment.newInstance()
    70            mapFragment = MapFragment()
    71            historyFragment = HistoryFragment.newInstance()
    72            savedPagesFragment = SavedPagesFragment()
    73            moreFragment = MoreFragment.newInstance()
    74            
    75            supportFragmentManager.beginTransaction()
    76                .add(R.id.nav_host_container, mainFragment, MAIN_FRAGMENT_TAG)
    77                .add(R.id.nav_host_container, mapFragment, MAP_FRAGMENT_TAG)
    78                .add(R.id.nav_host_container, historyFragment, HISTORY_FRAGMENT_TAG)
    79                .add(R.id.nav_host_container, savedPagesFragment, SAVED_PAGES_FRAGMENT_TAG)
    80                .add(R.id.nav_host_container, moreFragment, MORE_FRAGMENT_TAG)
    81                .runOnCommit {
    82                    // Ensure only mainFragment is visible on startup
    83                    mapFragment.view?.alpha = 0.0f
    84                    historyFragment.view?.alpha = 0.0f
    85                    savedPagesFragment.view?.alpha = 0.0f
    86                    moreFragment.view?.alpha = 0.0f
    87                    mainFragment.view?.alpha = 1.0f
    88                    
    89                    // FIX: Bring mainFragment to front so it can receive touches
    90                    mainFragment.view?.bringToFront()
    91                }
    92                .commit()
    93
    94            activeFragment = mainFragment
    95            L.d("MainActivity: onCreate: Fragments added. MainFragment is visible, others are hidden.")
    96        } else {
    97            L.d("MainActivity: onCreate: Restoring state.")
    98            val savedActiveTag = savedInstanceState.getString(ACTIVE_FRAGMENT_TAG, MAIN_FRAGMENT_TAG)
    99            
   100            // Restore fragments from FragmentManager and assign to properties
   101            mainFragment = supportFragmentManager.findFragmentByTag(MAIN_FRAGMENT_TAG) as MainFragment
   102            mapFragment = supportFragmentManager.findFragmentByTag(MAP_FRAGMENT_TAG) as MapFragment
   103            historyFragment = supportFragmentManager.findFragmentByTag(HISTORY_FRAGMENT_TAG) as HistoryFragment
   104            savedPagesFragment = supportFragmentManager.findFragmentByTag(SAVED_PAGES_FRAGMENT_TAG) as SavedPagesFragment
   105            moreFragment = supportFragmentManager.findFragmentByTag(MORE_FRAGMENT_TAG) as MoreFragment
   106            
   107            activeFragment = when (savedActiveTag) {
   108                MAP_FRAGMENT_TAG -> mapFragment
   109                HISTORY_FRAGMENT_TAG -> historyFragment
   110                SAVED_PAGES_FRAGMENT_TAG -> savedPagesFragment
   111                MORE_FRAGMENT_TAG -> moreFragment
   112                else -> mainFragment
   113            }
   114            
   115            // Execute pending transactions to ensure fragments are attached
   116            supportFragmentManager.executePendingTransactions()
   117            
   118            // Use ViewTreeObserver to set alpha after views are created and laid out
   119            binding.navHostContainer.viewTreeObserver.addOnGlobalLayoutListener(object : android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener {
   120                override fun onGlobalLayout() {
   121                    // Remove listener to avoid multiple calls
   122                    binding.navHostContainer.viewTreeObserver.removeOnGlobalLayoutListener(this)
   123                    
   124                    // Now views should exist, set alpha values
   125                    mainFragment.view?.alpha = if (activeFragment === mainFragment) 1.0f else 0.0f
   126                    mapFragment.view?.alpha = if (activeFragment === mapFragment) 1.0f else 0.0f
   127                    historyFragment.view?.alpha = if (activeFragment === historyFragment) 1.0f else 0.0f
   128                    savedPagesFragment.view?.alpha = if (activeFragment === savedPagesFragment) 1.0f else 0.0f
   129                    moreFragment.view?.alpha = if (activeFragment === moreFragment) 1.0f else 0.0f
   130                    
   131                    // Bring active fragment to front to ensure it receives touches
   132                    activeFragment.view?.bringToFront()
   133                    
   134                    L.d("MainActivity: Alpha values restored after layout")
   135                }
   136            })
   137            
   138            // Restore bottom navigation selected state
   139            val selectedItemId = when (activeFragment) {
   140                mapFragment -> R.id.nav_map
   141                historyFragment -> R.id.nav_search
   142                savedPagesFragment -> R.id.nav_saved
   143                moreFragment -> R.id.nav_more
   144                else -> R.id.nav_news
   145            }
   146            binding.bottomNav.selectedItemId = selectedItemId
   147            
   148            L.d("MainActivity: onCreate: Active fragment is ${activeFragment.javaClass.simpleName}")
   149        }
   150
   151        setupBottomNav()
   152        setupFonts()
   153        setupBackNavigation()
   154        handleIntentExtras(intent)
   155    }
   156    
   157    private fun setupFonts() {
   158        L.d("MainActivity: Setting up navigation fonts...")
   159        
   160        // Apply fonts to bottom navigation labels
   161        // The BottomNavigationView creates TextViews internally, we need to traverse and apply fonts
   162        try {
   163            applyFontsToBottomNavigation(binding.bottomNav)
   164        } catch (e: Exception) {
   165            L.e("MainActivity: Error applying fonts to navigation: ${e.message}")
   166        }
   167        
   168        L.d("MainActivity: Navigation fonts setup complete")
   169    }
   170    
   171    private fun applyFontsToBottomNavigation(bottomNav: com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView, selectedItemId: Int = bottomNav.selectedItemId) {
   172        // Access the BottomNavigationMenuView which contains the individual tabs
   173        val menuView = bottomNav.getChildAt(0) as com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationMenuView
   174        
   175        for (i in 0 until menuView.childCount) {
   176            val item = menuView.getChildAt(i)
   177            val menuItem = bottomNav.menu.getItem(i)
   178            val isActive = menuItem.itemId == selectedItemId
   179            
   180            // Find TextView children and apply font based on active state
   181            applyFontsToViewGroup(item as android.view.ViewGroup, isActive)
   182        }
   183    }
   184    
   185    private fun applyFontsToViewGroup(viewGroup: android.view.ViewGroup, isActive: Boolean = false) {
   186        for (i in 0 until viewGroup.childCount) {
   187            val child = viewGroup.getChildAt(i)
   188            when (child) {
   189                is TextView -> {
   190                    if (isActive) {
   191                        FontUtil.applyRubikUILabelMedium(child)
   192                        L.d("MainActivity: Applied MEDIUM font to ACTIVE navigation label: ${child.text}")
   193                    } else {
   194                        FontUtil.applyRubikUILabel(child)
   195                        L.d("MainActivity: Applied NORMAL font to navigation label: ${child.text}")
   196                    }
   197                }
   198                is android.view.ViewGroup -> {
   199                    applyFontsToViewGroup(child, isActive)
   200                }
   201            }
   202        }
   203    }
   204
   205    private fun setupBottomNav() {
   206        binding.bottomNav.setOnItemSelectedListener { item ->
   207            Log.d("MainActivity", "Bottom nav item selected: ${item.itemId}")
   208            val selectedFragment = when (item.itemId) {
   209                R.id.nav_news -> {
   210                    Log.d("MainActivity", "Navigating to Home (MainFragment)")
   211                    mainFragment
   212                }
   213                R.id.nav_saved -> {
   214                    Log.d("MainActivity", "Navigating to Saved Pages")
   215                    savedPagesFragment
   216                }
   217                R.id.nav_map -> {
   218                    Log.d("MainActivity", "Navigating to Map")
   219                    mapFragment
   220                }
   221                R.id.nav_search -> {
   222                    // Check if current fragment is already HistoryFragment
   223                    if (activeFragment === historyFragment) {
   224                        // Second tap - open search activity
   225                        Log.d("MainActivity", "Second tap on search - opening SearchActivity")
   226                        val intent = Intent(this, SearchActivity::class.java)
   227                        startActivity(intent)
   228                        return@setOnItemSelectedListener true
   229                    }
   230                    Log.d("MainActivity", "Navigating to History/Search")
   231                    historyFragment
   232                }
   233                R.id.nav_more -> {
   234                    Log.d("MainActivity", "Navigating to More")
   235                    moreFragment
   236                }
   237                else -> {
   238                    Log.w("MainActivity", "Unknown navigation item: ${item.itemId}")
   239                    null
   240                }
   241            }
   242
   243            if (selectedFragment != null && selectedFragment !== activeFragment) {
   244                L.d("MainActivity: Switching from ${activeFragment.javaClass.simpleName} to ${selectedFragment.javaClass.simpleName}")
   245
   246                activeFragment.view?.alpha = 0.0f
   247                selectedFragment.view?.alpha = 1.0f
   248                selectedFragment.view?.bringToFront()
   249
   250                activeFragment = selectedFragment
   251                
   252                // Refresh fonts to update active/inactive styling
   253                try {
   254                    applyFontsToBottomNavigation(binding.bottomNav, item.itemId)
   255                } catch (e: Exception) {
   256                    L.e("MainActivity: Error refreshing navigation fonts: ${e.message}")
   257                }
   258                
   259                true
   260            } else {
   261                false
   262            }
   263        }
   264    }
   265
   266    override fun onNewIntent(intent: Intent?) {
   267        super.onNewIntent(intent)
   268        setIntent(intent)
   269        intent?.let { handleIntentExtras(it) }
   270    }
   271
   272    private fun handleIntentExtras(intent: Intent) {
   273        if (intent.action == ACTION_NAVIGATE_TO_SEARCH) {
   274            L.d("MainActivity: Received ACTION_NAVIGATE_TO_SEARCH")
   275            supportFragmentManager.beginTransaction()
   276                .add(android.R.id.content, SearchFragment.newInstance())
   277                .addToBackStack(null)
   278                .commit()
   279        }
   280    }
   281
   282
   283    override fun onSupportNavigateUp(): Boolean {
   284        if (appRouter.goBack()) {
   285            return true
   286        }
   287        return super.onSupportNavigateUp()
   288    }
   289
   290    override fun onSaveInstanceState(outState: Bundle) {
   291        super.onSaveInstanceState(outState)
   292        val activeTag = when (activeFragment) {
   293            mapFragment -> MAP_FRAGMENT_TAG
   294            historyFragment -> HISTORY_FRAGMENT_TAG
   295            savedPagesFragment -> SAVED_PAGES_FRAGMENT_TAG
   296            moreFragment -> MORE_FRAGMENT_TAG
   297            else -> MAIN_FRAGMENT_TAG
   298        }
   299        outState.putString(ACTIVE_FRAGMENT_TAG, activeTag)
   300        L.d("MainActivity: onSaveInstanceState: Saved active fragment tag: $activeTag")
   301    }
   302
   303    private fun setupBackNavigation() {
   304        val backCallback = object : OnBackPressedCallback(true) {
   305            override fun handleOnBackPressed() {
   306                L.d("MainActivity: Back pressed, current fragment: ${activeFragment.javaClass.simpleName}")
   307                
   308                // If not on main fragment (Home), navigate to Home
   309                if (activeFragment !== mainFragment) {
   310                    L.d("MainActivity: Not on Home fragment, navigating to Home")
   311                    binding.bottomNav.selectedItemId = R.id.nav_news
   312                    return
   313                }
   314                
   315                // If on Home fragment, check appRouter first, then exit app
   316                L.d("MainActivity: On Home fragment, checking appRouter")
   317                if (!appRouter.goBack()) {
   318                    L.d("MainActivity: AppRouter returned false, exiting app")
   319                    finish()
   320                }
   321            }
   322        }
   323        onBackPressedDispatcher.addCallback(this, backCallback)
   324    }
   325}
   326

1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.settings
     2
     3import android.os.Bundle
     4import android.view.View
     5import android.widget.TextView
     6import androidx.preference.ListPreference
     7import androidx.preference.Preference
     8import androidx.preference.PreferenceFragmentCompat
     9import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
    10import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.R
    11import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.applyAlegreyaHeadline
    12import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.applyRubikUILabel
    13import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.applyRubikUILabelMedium
    14import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.applyRubikUILabelSmall
    15import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.applyInterBody
    16import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.log.L
    17
    18class AppearanceSettingsFragment : PreferenceFragmentCompat() {
    19
    20    override fun onCreatePreferences(savedInstanceState: Bundle?, rootKey: String?) {
    21        setPreferencesFromResource(R.xml.preferences_appearance, rootKey)
    22
    23        val appThemeModePref = findPreference<ListPreference>(Prefs.KEY_APP_THEME_MODE)
    24
    25        // Theme change listener for app theme mode preference.
    26        val themeChangeListener = Preference.OnPreferenceChangeListener { _, _ ->
    27            // Post the recreate call to the view's message queue. This ensures the
    28            // preference value has time to be persisted before the activity is destroyed,
    29            // and provides immediate visual feedback for the theme change.
    30            view?.post {
    31                activity?.recreate()
    32            }
    33
    34            // Return true to allow the preference change to be saved.
    35            true
    36        }
    37
    38        // Assign the listener to the app theme mode preference.
    39        appThemeModePref?.onPreferenceChangeListener = themeChangeListener
    40    }
    41
    42    override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
    43        super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState)
    44        setupFonts()
    45    }
    46
    47    private fun setupFonts() {
    48        L.d("AppearanceSettingsFragment: Setting up fonts...")
    49        
    50        // Apply fonts to preference TextViews by traversing the RecyclerView
    51        val recyclerView = listView as? RecyclerView
    52        recyclerView?.post {
    53            applyFontsToPreferences(recyclerView)
    54        }
    55    }
    56
    57    private fun applyFontsToPreferences(recyclerView: RecyclerView) {
    58        for (i in 0 until recyclerView.childCount) {
    59            val itemView = recyclerView.getChildAt(i)
    60            applyFontsToPreferenceItem(itemView)
    61        }
    62        
    63        // Also set up a scroll listener to apply fonts to newly visible items
    64        recyclerView.addOnScrollListener(object : RecyclerView.OnScrollListener() {
    65            override fun onScrolled(recyclerView: RecyclerView, dx: Int, dy: Int) {
    66                super.onScrolled(recyclerView, dx, dy)
    67                for (i in 0 until recyclerView.childCount) {
    68                    val itemView = recyclerView.getChildAt(i)
    69                    applyFontsToPreferenceItem(itemView)
    70                }
    71            }
    72        })
    73        
    74        L.d("AppearanceSettingsFragment: Fonts applied to preference items")
    75    }
    76
    77    private fun applyFontsToPreferenceItem(itemView: View) {
    78        // Find TextViews in the preference item and apply appropriate fonts
    79        val title = itemView.findViewById<TextView>(android.R.id.title)
    80        val summary = itemView.findViewById<TextView>(android.R.id.summary)
    81        
    82        title?.applyRubikUILabelSmall()
    83        summary?.applyRubikUILabel()
    84    }
    85
    86
    87    companion object {
    88        const val TAG = "AppearanceSettingsFragment"
    89        fun newInstance(): AppearanceSettingsFragment {
    90            return AppearanceSettingsFragment()
    91        }
    92    }
    93}

1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.news.ui
     2
     3import android.content.Intent
     4import android.net.Uri
     5import android.os.Bundle
     6import android.view.LayoutInflater
     7import android.view.View
     8import android.view.ViewGroup
     9import android.widget.ImageButton
    10import android.widget.ImageView
    11import android.widget.TextView
    12import android.widget.Toast
    13import androidx.activity.result.contract.ActivityResultContracts
    14import androidx.core.view.doOnLayout
    15import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    16import androidx.fragment.app.viewModels
    17import androidx.lifecycle.lifecycleScope
    18import androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager
    19import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
    20import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.R
    21import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.history.db.HistoryEntry
    22import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.news.viewmodel.NewsViewModel
    23import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page.PageActivity
    24import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.random.RandomPageRepository
    25import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.search.SearchActivity
    26import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.SpeechRecognitionManager
    27import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.createVoiceRecognitionManager
    28import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.VoiceSearchAnimationHelper
    29import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.createVoiceSearchAnimationHelper
    30import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.log.L
    31import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.applyAlegreyaHeadline
    32import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.applyRubikUIHint
    33import kotlinx.coroutines.launch
    34import java.net.URLDecoder
    35
    36/**
    37 * A fragment to display a feed of recent news and updates from the OSRS Wiki.
    38 * This UI is modeled after the Wikipedia app's "Explore" feed, presenting
    39 * different types of content in a card-based RecyclerView.
    40 */
    41class NewsFragment : Fragment() {
    42
    43    private val viewModel: NewsViewModel by viewModels()
    44    private lateinit var newsFeedAdapter: NewsFeedAdapter
    45    private val wikiBaseUrl = "https://oldschool.runescape.wiki"
    46    
    47    private lateinit var voiceRecognitionManager: SpeechRecognitionManager
    48    private lateinit var voiceAnimationHelper: VoiceSearchAnimationHelper
    49    private val voiceSearchLauncher = registerForActivityResult(ActivityResultContracts.StartActivityForResult()) { result ->
    50        voiceRecognitionManager.handleActivityResult(result.resultCode, result.data)
    51    }
    52
    53    override fun onCreateView(
    54        inflater: LayoutInflater,
    55        container: ViewGroup?,
    56        savedInstanceState: Bundle?
    57    ): View? {
    58        // This function should only inflate and return the view.
    59        return inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_news, container, false)
    60    }
    61
    62    override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
    63        super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState)
    64        setupHeader(view)
    65        setupSearch(view)
    66        setupFonts(view)
    67        setupRecyclerView(view)
    68        observeViewModel()
    69
    70        // Diagnostic logging for header position
    71        view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.page_title)?.doOnLayout {
    72            val location = IntArray(2)
    73            view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.page_title)?.getLocationOnScreen(location)
    74            L.d("HeaderPosition: News title Y-coordinate: ${location[1]}")
    75        }
    76
    77        // Initial data fetch
    78        if (savedInstanceState == null) {
    79            viewModel.fetchNews()
    80        }
    81    }
    82
    83    private fun setupHeader(view: View) {
    84        // Set the page title to "Home"
    85        view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.page_title)?.text = getString(R.string.nav_news)
    86        
    87        // Show and setup the random page button
    88        val randomPageButton = view.findViewById<ImageButton>(R.id.random_page_button)
    89        randomPageButton?.apply {
    90            visibility = View.VISIBLE
    91            setOnClickListener {
    92                handleRandomPageClick()
    93            }
    94        }
    95    }
    96    
    97    private fun setupFonts(view: View) {
    98        L.d("NewsFragment: Setting up fonts...")
    99        
   100        // Apply fonts to header elements
   101        view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.page_title)?.applyAlegreyaHeadline()
   102        view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.search_text)?.applyRubikUIHint()
   103        
   104        L.d("NewsFragment: Fonts applied to header elements")
   105    }
   106
   107    private fun setupSearch(view: View) {
   108        val voiceSearchButton = view.findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.voice_search_button)
   109        
   110        // Initialize voice animation helper
   111        if (voiceSearchButton != null) {
   112            voiceAnimationHelper = voiceSearchButton.createVoiceSearchAnimationHelper()
   113        }
   114        
   115        // Initialize voice recognition manager with fallback support
   116        voiceRecognitionManager = createVoiceRecognitionManager(
   117            onResult = { query ->
   118                // Open search activity with the voice query
   119                val intent = Intent(requireContext(), SearchActivity::class.java).apply {
   120                    putExtra("query", query)
   121                }
   122                startActivity(intent)
   123            },
   124            onPartialResult = { partialQuery ->
   125                // Could show a temporary overlay or hint with partial results
   126                // For now, we'll just log it since we navigate to SearchActivity on final result
   127                L.d("NewsFragment: Partial result: $partialQuery")
   128            },
   129            onStateChanged = { state ->
   130                // Update UI based on speech recognition state
   131                if (::voiceAnimationHelper.isInitialized) {
   132                    when (state) {
   133                        SpeechRecognitionManager.SpeechState.IDLE -> {
   134                            voiceAnimationHelper.setIdleState()
   135                        }
   136                        SpeechRecognitionManager.SpeechState.LISTENING -> {
   137                            voiceAnimationHelper.setListeningState()
   138                        }
   139                        SpeechRecognitionManager.SpeechState.PROCESSING -> {
   140                            voiceAnimationHelper.setProcessingState()
   141                        }
   142                        SpeechRecognitionManager.SpeechState.ERROR -> {
   143                            voiceAnimationHelper.setErrorState()
   144                        }
   145                    }
   146                }
   147            },
   148            fallbackLauncher = voiceSearchLauncher
   149        )
   150        
   151        // Set a click listener on the search bar view to launch the search activity.
   152        view.findViewById<View>(R.id.search_container).setOnClickListener {
   153            val intent = Intent(requireContext(), SearchActivity::class.java)
   154            startActivity(intent)
   155        }
   156        
   157        // Set up voice search button
   158        voiceSearchButton?.setOnClickListener {
   159            voiceRecognitionManager.startVoiceRecognition()
   160        }
   161    }

   163    private fun handleLinkClick(url: String) {
   164        L.d("Link clicked. Original URL: $url")
   165
   166        // Defensively handle relative URLs by prepending the base URL if needed.
   167        val absoluteUrl = if (url.startsWith("/")) {
   168            "$wikiBaseUrl$url"
   169        } else {
   170            url
   171        }
   172
   173        if (absoluteUrl.startsWith(wikiBaseUrl)) {
   174            // Internal link, open in PageActivity
   175            try {
   176                val title = getPageTitleFromUrl(absoluteUrl)
   177                startActivity(
   178                    PageActivity.newIntent(requireContext(), title, null, HistoryEntry.SOURCE_NEWS)
   179                )
   180            } catch (e: Exception) {
   181                L.e("Could not parse page title from internal URL: $absoluteUrl", e)
   182                Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Error opening internal link.", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
   183            }
   184        } else {
   185            // External link, open in browser
   186            try {
   187                val intent = Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW, Uri.parse(absoluteUrl))
   188                startActivity(intent)
   189            } catch (e: Exception) {
   190                L.e("Failed to open external link: $absoluteUrl", e)
   191                Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Could not open external link.", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
   192            }
   193        }
   194    }
   195
   196    private fun getPageTitleFromUrl(url: String): String {
   197        val pathSegment = url.substringAfterLast('/')
   198        val withSpaces = pathSegment.replace('_', ' ')
   199        return URLDecoder.decode(withSpaces, "UTF-8")
   200    }

   208                L.d("  updateItem.snippet: '${updateItem.snippet}'")
   209                L.d("  updateItem.imageUrl: '${updateItem.imageUrl}'")
   210                L.d("NewsFragment: About to call PageActivity.newIntent()")
   211                
   212                try {
   213                    val intent = PageActivity.newIntent(requireContext(), updateItem, HistoryEntry.SOURCE_NEWS)
   214                    L.d("NewsFragment: PageActivity intent created successfully")
   215                    L.d("NewsFragment: Starting PageActivity...")
   216                    startActivity(intent)
   217                    L.d("NewsFragment: PageActivity started successfully")
   218                } catch (e: Exception) {
   219                    L.e("NewsFragment: Exception when starting PageActivity", e)
   220                }
   221            },
   222            onLinkClicked = { url ->
   223                handleLinkClick(url)
   224            }
   225        )
   226
   227        view.findViewById<RecyclerView>(R.id.recyclerViewNews).apply {
   228            layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(requireContext())
   229            adapter = newsFeedAdapter
   230        }

   234        viewModel.feedItems.observe(viewLifecycleOwner) { feedItems ->
   235            // Pass the fetched data to the adapter.
   236            newsFeedAdapter.setItems(feedItems)

   240    private fun handleRandomPageClick() {
   241        L.d("NewsFragment: Random page button clicked")
   242        
   243        lifecycleScope.launch {

   262                        Toast.LENGTH_SHORT
   263                    ).show()

   267                Toast.makeText(

1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.activity
     2
     3import android.content.res.Configuration
     4import android.os.Bundle
     5import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
     6import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.OSRSWikiApp
     7import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.settings.Prefs
     8
     9abstract class BaseActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    10
    11    private var currentThemeId: Int = 0
    12
    13    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
    14        // Apply the selected theme BEFORE super.onCreate() and setContentView().
    15        applyCurrentTheme()
    16        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
    17    }
    18
    19    override fun onResume() {
    20        super.onResume()
    21        // When resuming, check if the global theme has changed since this activity
    22        // was last created. If so, recreate it to apply the new theme.
    23        val globalThemeId = (application as OSRSWikiApp).getCurrentTheme().resourceId
    24        if (currentThemeId != 0 && currentThemeId != globalThemeId) {
    25            recreate()
    26        }
    27    }
    28
    29    override fun onConfigurationChanged(newConfig: Configuration) {
    30        super.onConfigurationChanged(newConfig)
    31        // Check if the UI mode has changed (e.g., system light/dark theme switch).
    32        // If the app's theme is set to "auto", we need to recreate the activity
    33        // to apply the new system-driven theme.
    34        if (Prefs.appThemeMode == "auto") {
    35            // The theme is resolved in OSRSWikiApp.getCurrentTheme() which reads the system
    36            // state, so simply recreating is sufficient.
    37            recreate()
    38        }
    39    }
    40
    41    private fun applyCurrentTheme() {
    42        val osrsWikiApp = applicationContext as OSRSWikiApp
    43        val selectedTheme = osrsWikiApp.getCurrentTheme()
    44        // Cache the ID of the theme being applied to this activity instance.
    45        currentThemeId = selectedTheme.resourceId
    46        setTheme(selectedTheme.resourceId)
    47    }
    48}

   225    private fun deleteAllSavedPages() {
   226        viewLifecycleOwner.lifecycleScope.launch {
   227            try {
   228                withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
   229                    val readingListPageDao = AppDatabase.instance.readingListPageDao()
   230                    val offlineObjectDao = AppDatabase.instance.offlineObjectDao()
   231                    val ftsDao = AppDatabase.instance.offlinePageFtsDao()
   232                    
   233                    // Get all saved pages
   234                    val allSavedPages = readingListPageDao.getPagesByStatusAndOffline(
   235                        ReadingListPage.STATUS_SAVED, true
   236                    )
   237                    
   238                    // Delete offline objects and FTS entries for each page
   239                    for (page in allSavedPages) {
   240                        try {
   241                            // Delete offline objects
   242                            offlineObjectDao.deleteObjectsForPageIds(listOf(page.id), requireContext())
   243                            
   244                            // Delete FTS entry
   245                            val pageTitleHelper = ReadingListPage.toPageTitle(page)
   246                            val canonicalPageUrlForFts = pageTitleHelper.uri
   247                            ftsDao.deletePageContentByUrl(canonicalPageUrlForFts)
   248                        } catch (e: Exception) {
   249                            Log.e("SavedPagesFragment", "Error deleting offline data for page: ${page.displayTitle}", e)
   250                        }
   251                    }
   252                    
   253                    // Delete all pages from reading list
   254                    val pageIds = allSavedPages.map { it.id }
   255                    if (pageIds.isNotEmpty()) {
   256                        readingListPageDao.deletePagesByIds(pageIds)
   257                    }
   258                }
   259                
   260                Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "All saved pages deleted", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
   261            } catch (e: Exception) {
   262                Log.e("SavedPagesFragment", "Error deleting all saved pages", e)
   263                Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Error deleting saved pages", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
   264            }
   265        }
   266    }

   268    private fun retryFailedDownloads() {
   269        viewLifecycleOwner.lifecycleScope.launch {
   270            try {
   271                withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
   272                    val readingListPageDao = AppDatabase.instance.readingListPageDao()
   273                    
   274                    // Get all pages with error status
   275                    val failedPages = readingListPageDao.getPagesByStatus(ReadingListPage.STATUS_ERROR)
   276                    
   277                    if (failedPages.isNotEmpty()) {
   278                        // Mark all failed pages for retry
   279                        for (page in failedPages) {
   280                            readingListPageDao.updatePageStatusToSavedAndMtime(
   281                                page.id, 
   282                                ReadingListPage.STATUS_QUEUE_FOR_SAVE, 
   283                                System.currentTimeMillis()
   284                            )
   285                        }
   286                        
   287                        // Enqueue the sync worker to retry downloads
   288                        SavedPageSyncWorker.enqueue(requireContext())
   289                    }
   290                }
   291                
   292                Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Retrying failed downloads", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
   293            } catch (e: Exception) {
   294                Log.e("SavedPagesFragment", "Error retrying failed downloads", e)
   295                Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Error retrying downloads", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
   296            }
   297        }
   298    }

   313    
   314    private inner class SwipeToDeleteCallback(
   315        private val onItemDelete: (ReadingListPage) -> Unit
   316    ) : ItemTouchHelper.SimpleCallback(0, ItemTouchHelper.LEFT or ItemTouchHelper.RIGHT) {
   317
   318        private val deleteIcon: Drawable = ContextCompat.getDrawable(requireContext(), R.drawable.ic_baseline_delete_24)!!
   319        private val background = ColorDrawable()
   320        private val backgroundColor = ContextCompat.getColor(requireContext(), android.R.color.holo_red_light)
   321
   322        override fun onMove(
   323            recyclerView: RecyclerView,
   324            viewHolder: RecyclerView.ViewHolder,
   325            target: RecyclerView.ViewHolder
   326        ): Boolean = false
   327
   328        override fun onSwiped(viewHolder: RecyclerView.ViewHolder, direction: Int) {
   329            val position = viewHolder.bindingAdapterPosition
   330            if (position != RecyclerView.NO_POSITION) {
   331                val savedPage = savedPagesAdapter.currentList[position]
   332                onItemDelete(savedPage)
   333            }
   334        }
   335
   336        override fun onChildDraw(
   337            c: Canvas,
   338            recyclerView: RecyclerView,
   339            viewHolder: RecyclerView.ViewHolder,
   340            dX: Float,
   341            dY: Float,
   342            actionState: Int,
   343            isCurrentlyActive: Boolean
   344        ) {
   345            super.onChildDraw(c, recyclerView, viewHolder, dX, dY, actionState, isCurrentlyActive)
   346
   347            val itemView = viewHolder.itemView
   348            val backgroundCornerOffset = 20
   349
   350            when {
   351                dX > 0 -> { // Swiping to the right
   352                    background.color = backgroundColor
   353                    background.setBounds(
   354                        itemView.left,
   355                        itemView.top,
   356                        itemView.left + dX.toInt() + backgroundCornerOffset,
   357                        itemView.bottom
   358                    )
   359                    
   360                    val iconTop = itemView.top + (itemView.height - deleteIcon.intrinsicHeight) / 2
   361                    val iconMargin = (itemView.height - deleteIcon.intrinsicHeight) / 2
   362                    val iconLeft = itemView.left + iconMargin
   363                    val iconRight = itemView.left + iconMargin + deleteIcon.intrinsicWidth
   364                    val iconBottom = iconTop + deleteIcon.intrinsicHeight
   365                    
   366                    deleteIcon.setBounds(iconLeft, iconTop, iconRight, iconBottom)
   367                    
   368                    // Draw background first
   369                    background.draw(c)
   370                    
   371                    // Clip canvas to background area and draw icon
   372                    c.save()
   373                    c.clipRect(
   374                        itemView.left.toFloat(),
   375                        itemView.top.toFloat(),
   376                        (itemView.left + dX + backgroundCornerOffset).toFloat(),
   377                        itemView.bottom.toFloat()
   378                    )
   379                    deleteIcon.draw(c)
   380                    c.restore()
   381                }
   382                dX < 0 -> { // Swiping to the left
   383                    background.color = backgroundColor
   384                    background.setBounds(
   385                        itemView.right + dX.toInt() - backgroundCornerOffset,
   386                        itemView.top,
   387                        itemView.right,
   388                        itemView.bottom
   389                    )
   390                    
   391                    val iconTop = itemView.top + (itemView.height - deleteIcon.intrinsicHeight) / 2
   392                    val iconMargin = (itemView.height - deleteIcon.intrinsicHeight) / 2
   393                    val iconLeft = itemView.right - iconMargin - deleteIcon.intrinsicWidth
   394                    val iconRight = itemView.right - iconMargin
   395                    val iconBottom = iconTop + deleteIcon.intrinsicHeight
   396                    
   397                    deleteIcon.setBounds(iconLeft, iconTop, iconRight, iconBottom)
   398                    
   399                    // Draw background first
   400                    background.draw(c)
   401                    
   402                    // Clip canvas to background area and draw icon
   403                    c.save()
   404                    c.clipRect(
   405                        (itemView.right + dX - backgroundCornerOffset).toFloat(),
   406                        itemView.top.toFloat(),
   407                        itemView.right.toFloat(),
   408                        itemView.bottom.toFloat()
   409                    )
   410                    deleteIcon.draw(c)
   411                    c.restore()
   412                }
   413                else -> { // No swipe
   414                    background.setBounds(0, 0, 0, 0)
   415                    return // Don't draw anything when not swiping
   416                }
   417            }
   418        }
   419    }
   420}

1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki
     2
     3import android.app.Application
     4import android.content.Context
     5import android.content.res.Configuration
     6import android.graphics.Bitmap
     7import android.net.ConnectivityManager
     8import android.net.Network
     9import android.net.NetworkCapabilities
    10import android.net.NetworkRequest
    11import android.os.Build
    12import android.util.Log
    13import android.webkit.WebView
    14import androidx.collection.LruCache
    15import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.database.AppDatabase
    16import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.network.OkHttpClientFactory
    17import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.network.RetrofitClient
    18import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page.PageAssetDownloader
    19import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page.PageHtmlBuilder
    20import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page.PageLocalDataSource
    21import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page.PageRemoteDataSource
    22import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page.PageRepository
    23import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.search.SearchRepository
    24import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.settings.Prefs
    25import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.theme.Theme
    26import kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineScope
    27import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
    28import kotlinx.coroutines.SupervisorJob
    29import kotlinx.coroutines.launch
    30import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.MutableStateFlow
    31import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.StateFlow
    32import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.asStateFlow
    33
    34class OSRSWikiApp : Application() {
    35
    36    val applicationScope = CoroutineScope(SupervisorJob() + Dispatchers.IO)
    37
    38    val imageCache: LruCache<String, Bitmap> = LruCache(10)
    39
    40    lateinit var pageRepository: PageRepository
    41        private set
    42
    43    lateinit var searchRepository: SearchRepository
    44        private set
    45
    46    // Added for preemptive loading
    47    lateinit var pageAssetDownloader: PageAssetDownloader
    48        private set
    49
    50    // Added for preemptive loading
    51    lateinit var pageHtmlBuilder: PageHtmlBuilder
    52        private set
    53
    54    // Repository initialization status
    55    val isRepositoriesInitialized: Boolean 
    56        get() = ::pageRepository.isInitialized && ::searchRepository.isInitialized
    57
    58
    59    private val _currentNetworkStatus = MutableStateFlow(false)
    60    val currentNetworkStatus: StateFlow<Boolean> = _currentNetworkStatus.asStateFlow()
    61    private var connectivityManager: ConnectivityManager? = null
    62    private var networkCallback: ConnectivityManager.NetworkCallback? = null
    63
    64    companion object {
    65        lateinit var instance: OSRSWikiApp
    66            private set
    67
    68        @JvmStatic
    69        fun logCrashManually(throwable: Throwable, message: String? = null) {
    70            val logMessage = message?.let { "$it: ${throwable.message}" } ?: throwable.message
    71            Log.e("OSRSWikiApp_CrashLog", "Manual crash log: $logMessage", throwable)
    72        }
    73    }
    74
    75    override fun onCreate() {
    76        super.onCreate()
    77        instance = this
    78
    79        if (BuildConfig.DEBUG) {
    80            WebView.setWebContentsDebuggingEnabled(true)
    81        }
    82
    83        // Pre-warm database on background thread to prevent main thread blocking
    84        applicationScope.launch(Dispatchers.IO) {
    85            AppDatabase.instance // Force database creation/migration on background thread
    86        }
    87
    88        initializeDependencies()
    89    }
    90
    91    private fun initializeDependencies() {
    92        val appContext = this.applicationContext
    93        
    94        // Access pre-warmed database instance (should be ready from background thread)
    95        val appDb = AppDatabase.instance
    96        val mediaWikiApiService = RetrofitClient.apiService
    97        // Correctly get the shared OkHttpClient from the factory.
    98        val okHttpClient = OkHttpClientFactory.offlineClient
    99
   100        try {
   101            // Create PageHtmlBuilder first
   102            pageHtmlBuilder = PageHtmlBuilder(this)
   103
   104            // Create PageRepository
   105            val pageLocalDataSource = PageLocalDataSource(
   106                articleMetaDao = appDb.articleMetaDao(),
   107                applicationContext = appContext
   108            )
   109            val pageRemoteDataSource = PageRemoteDataSource(
   110                mediaWikiApiService = mediaWikiApiService
   111            )
   112            pageRepository = PageRepository(
   113                localDataSource = pageLocalDataSource,
   114                remoteDataSource = pageRemoteDataSource,
   115                htmlBuilder = pageHtmlBuilder,
   116                readingListPageDao = appDb.readingListPageDao()
   117            )
   118            
   119            // Instantiate PageAssetDownloader with PageRepository for cache checking
   120            pageAssetDownloader = PageAssetDownloader(okHttpClient, pageRepository)
   121
   122            // Instantiate the SearchRepository with all its DAO dependencies.
   123            val articleMetaDaoForSearchRepo = appDb.articleMetaDao()
   124            val offlinePageFtsDao = appDb.offlinePageFtsDao()
   125            val recentSearchDao = appDb.recentSearchDao() // Get the new DAO from the database.
   126            searchRepository = SearchRepository(
   127                apiService = mediaWikiApiService,
   128                articleMetaDao = articleMetaDaoForSearchRepo,
   129                offlinePageFtsDao = offlinePageFtsDao,
   130                recentSearchDao = recentSearchDao // Provide the new DAO to the repository.
   131            )
   132
   133            initializeNetworkCallback()
   134        } catch (e: Exception) {
   135            logCrashManually(e, "Failed to initialize dependencies")
   136            throw e // Re-throw to prevent app from continuing in broken state
   137        }
   138    }
   139
   140    override fun onTerminate() {
   141        super.onTerminate()
   142        unregisterNetworkCallback()
   143    }
   144
   145    fun getCurrentTheme(): Theme {
   146        val themeMode = Prefs.appThemeMode
   147        val isNightMode = when (themeMode) {
   148            "light" -> false
   149            "dark" -> true
   150            "auto" -> {
   151                val nightModeFlags = resources.configuration.uiMode and Configuration.UI_MODE_NIGHT_MASK
   152                nightModeFlags == Configuration.UI_MODE_NIGHT_YES
   153            }
   154            else -> {
   155                val nightModeFlags = resources.configuration.uiMode and Configuration.UI_MODE_NIGHT_MASK
   156                nightModeFlags == Configuration.UI_MODE_NIGHT_YES
   157            }
   158        }
   159        return if (isNightMode) Theme.OSRS_DARK else Theme.OSRS_LIGHT
   160    }
   161
   162    private fun initializeNetworkCallback() {
   163        connectivityManager = getSystemService(Context.CONNECTIVITY_SERVICE) as ConnectivityManager
   164        _currentNetworkStatus.value = isCurrentlyConnected()
   165        networkCallback = object : ConnectivityManager.NetworkCallback() {
   166            override fun onAvailable(network: Network) {
   167                super.onAvailable(network)
   168                _currentNetworkStatus.value = true
   169            }
   170
   171            override fun onLost(network: Network) {
   172                super.onLost(network)
   173                _currentNetworkStatus.value = false
   174            }
   175
   176            override fun onCapabilitiesChanged(network: Network, networkCapabilities: NetworkCapabilities) {
   177                super.onCapabilitiesChanged(network, networkCapabilities)
   178                val isConnected = networkCapabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET) &&
   179                        networkCapabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_VALIDATED)
   180                _currentNetworkStatus.value = isConnected
   181            }
   182        }
   183        val networkRequest = NetworkRequest.Builder()
   184            .addCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET)
   185            .build()
   186        connectivityManager?.registerNetworkCallback(networkRequest, networkCallback!!)
   187    }
   188
   189    private fun unregisterNetworkCallback() {
   190        networkCallback?.let { callback ->
   191            connectivityManager?.unregisterNetworkCallback(callback)
   192        }
   193        networkCallback = null
   194        connectivityManager = null
   195    }
   196
   197    @Suppress("DEPRECATION")
   198    private fun isCurrentlyConnected(): Boolean {
   199        val cm = getSystemService(Context.CONNECTIVITY_SERVICE) as ConnectivityManager
   200        return if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.M) {
   201            cm.getNetworkCapabilities(cm.activeNetwork)?.let {
   202                it.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET) &&
   203                        it.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_VALIDATED)
   204            } ?: false
   205        } else {
   206            cm.activeNetworkInfo?.isConnected ?: false
   207        }
   208    }
   209
   210}
   211

package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.settings

/**
 * Provides easy access to app-wide shared preferences.
 */
object Prefs {
    // String constants for preference keys, to be used by fragments and the data layer.
    // These keys MUST match the keys defined in res/xml/preferences.xml
    const val KEY_APP_THEME_MODE = "app_theme_mode"
    const val KEY_DOWNLOAD_READING_LIST_ARTICLES = "downloadReadingListArticles"
    const val KEY_COLLAPSE_TABLES = "collapseTables"
    const val KEY_OFFLINE_CACHE_SIZE_LIMIT = "offlineCacheSizeLimit"

    /**
     * Gets whether tables in WebViews should be collapsed by default.
     * Defaults to true.
     */
    val isCollapseTablesEnabled
        get() = PrefsIoUtil.getBoolean(KEY_COLLAPSE_TABLES, true)

    /**
     * Gets whether reading list articles should be downloaded for offline use.
     * Defaults to true.
     */
    val isDownloadingReadingListArticlesEnabled
        get() = PrefsIoUtil.getBoolean(KEY_DOWNLOAD_READING_LIST_ARTICLES, true)

    /**
     * Gets the current theme mode (e.g., auto, light, dark).
     * Defaults to "auto".
     */
    val appThemeMode
        get() = PrefsIoUtil.getString(KEY_APP_THEME_MODE, "auto") ?: "auto"


    /**
     * Gets the cache size limit in megabytes.
     * Defaults to "100" (100 MB).
     */
    val offlineCacheSizeLimitMB
        get() = PrefsIoUtil.getString(KEY_OFFLINE_CACHE_SIZE_LIMIT, "100")?.toIntOrNull() ?: 100
}

    29        inflater: LayoutInflater, 
    30        container: ViewGroup?,
    31        savedInstanceState: Bundle?
    32    ): View {
    33        L.d("MoreFragment: onCreateView called.")
    34        _binding = FragmentMoreBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false)
    35        return binding.root
    36    }
    37
    38    override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
    39        super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState)
    40        L.d("MoreFragment: onViewCreated called.")
    41        
    42        setupRecyclerView()
    43    }
    44    
    45    private fun setupRecyclerView() {
    46        val moreItems = listOf(
    47            MoreItem(
    48                titleRes = R.string.settings_category_appearance,
    49                iconRes = R.drawable.ic_page_action_theme,
    50                action = MoreAction.APPEARANCE
    51            ),
    52            MoreItem(
    53                titleRes = R.string.menu_title_donate,
    54                iconRes = R.drawable.ic_donate_24,
    55                action = MoreAction.DONATE
    56            ),
    57            MoreItem(
    58                titleRes = R.string.menu_title_about,
    59                iconRes = R.drawable.ic_about_24,
    60                action = MoreAction.ABOUT
    61            ),
    62            MoreItem(
    63                titleRes = R.string.menu_title_feedback,
    64                iconRes = R.drawable.ic_feedback_24,
    65                action = MoreAction.FEEDBACK
    66            )
    67        )
    68        
    69        adapter = MoreAdapter(
    70            items = moreItems,
    71            onItemClick = { action ->
    72                handleMoreItemClick(action)
    73            }
    74        )
    75        
    76        binding.recyclerViewMore.apply {
    77            layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(context)
    78            adapter = this@MoreFragment.adapter
    79        }
    80    }
    81    
    82    private fun handleMoreItemClick(action: MoreAction) {
    83        L.d("MoreFragment: More item clicked: $action")
    84        when (action) {
    85            MoreAction.APPEARANCE -> {
    86                val intent = AppearanceSettingsActivity.newIntent(requireContext())
    87                startActivity(intent)
    88            }
    89            MoreAction.DONATE -> {
    90                val intent = DonateActivity.newIntent(requireContext())
    91                startActivity(intent)
    92            }
    93            MoreAction.ABOUT -> {
    94                val intent = AboutActivity.newIntent(requireContext())
    95                startActivity(intent)
    96            }
    97            MoreAction.FEEDBACK -> {
    98                val intent = FeedbackActivity.newIntent(requireContext())
    99                startActivity(intent)
   100            }
   101            else -> {
   102                L.d("MoreFragment: Action not yet implemented: $action")
   103            }
   104        }
   105    }
   106
   107    override fun onDestroyView() {
   108        L.d("MoreFragment: onDestroyView called.")
   109        _binding = null
   110        super.onDestroyView()
   111    }
   112}

<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".news.NewsFragment">

    <com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout
        android:id="@+id/news_app_bar"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="?attr/paper_color"
        app:elevation="0dp"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">

        <include
            android:id="@+id/news_header_view"
            layout="@layout/view_tab_header_with_search"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content" />

    </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>


    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
        android:id="@+id/recyclerViewNews"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="0dp"
        android:scrollbars="vertical"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/news_app_bar"
        tools:listitem="@layout/item_news_update" />

    <ProgressBar
        android:id="@+id/progressBarNews"
        style="?android:attr/progressBarStyle"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:visibility="gone"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/textViewNewsError"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/news_fetch_error"
        android:visibility="gone"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.settings
     2
     3import android.content.Context
     4import android.content.Intent
     5import android.os.Bundle
     6import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.R
     7import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.activity.BaseActivity
     8
     9/**
    10 * Activity to host the AppearanceSettingsFragment for appearance-specific settings.
    11 * Shows only theme, color, and display options - no offline/storage settings.
    12 */
    13class AppearanceSettingsActivity : BaseActivity() {
    14
    15    companion object {
    16        /**
    17         * Creates an Intent to start AppearanceSettingsActivity.
    18         * @param context The Context to use.
    19         * @return An Intent to start AppearanceSettingsActivity.
    20         */
    21        fun newIntent(context: Context): Intent {
    22            return Intent(context, AppearanceSettingsActivity::class.java)
    23        }
    24    }
    25
    26    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
    27        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
    28        setContentView(R.layout.activity_appearance_settings)
    29
    30        if (savedInstanceState == null) {
    31            supportFragmentManager
    32                .beginTransaction()
    33                .replace(
    34                    R.id.appearance_settings_container, 
    35                    AppearanceSettingsFragment.newInstance(), 
    36                    AppearanceSettingsFragment.TAG
    37                )
    38                .commit()
    39        }
    40
    41        setupToolbar()
    42    }
    43
    44    private fun setupToolbar() {
    45        supportActionBar?.apply {
    46            title = getString(R.string.settings_category_appearance)
    47            setDisplayHomeAsUpEnabled(true)
    48            setDisplayShowHomeEnabled(true)
    49        }
    50    }
    51
    52    override fun onSupportNavigateUp(): Boolean {
    53        onBackPressedDispatcher.onBackPressed()
    54        return true
    55    }
    56}

    61                    putString(ARG_LAT, lat)
    62                    putString(ARG_LON, lon)
    63                    putString(ARG_ZOOM, zoom)
    64                    putString(ARG_PLANE, plane)
    65                    putBoolean(ARG_IS_PRELOADING, isPreloading)
    66                }
    67            }
    68        }
    69
    70        private fun gameToLatLng(gx: Double, gy: Double): LatLng {
    71            val gameCoordScale = 4.0
    72            val gameMinX = 1024.0
    73            val gameMaxY = 12608.0
    74            val canvasSize = 65536.0
    75            val px = (gx - gameMinX) * gameCoordScale
    76            val py = (gameMaxY - gy) * gameCoordScale
    77            val nx = px / canvasSize
    78            val ny = py / canvasSize
    79            val lon = -180.0 + nx * 360.0
    80            val lat = Math.toDegrees(Math.atan(Math.sinh(Math.PI * (1.0 - 2.0 * ny))))
    81            return LatLng(lat, lon)
    82        }
    83    }
    84
    85    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
    86        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
    87        L.d("MapFragment: LIFECYCLE: onCreate")
    88        MapLibre.getInstance(requireContext())
    89        arguments?.getString(ARG_PLANE)?.toIntOrNull()?.let {
    90            currentFloor = it
    91        }
    92    }
    93
    94    override fun onCreateView(
    95        inflater: LayoutInflater,
    96        container: ViewGroup?,
    97        savedInstanceState: Bundle?
    98    ): View {
    99        L.d("MapFragment: LIFECYCLE: onCreateView")
   100        _binding = FragmentMapBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false)
   101        return binding.root
   102    }
   103
   104    override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
   105        super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState)
   106        L.d("MapFragment: LIFECYCLE: onViewCreated")
   107        
   108        mapView = binding.mapView
   109
   110        lifecycleScope.launch {
   111            copyAssetsToInternalStorage()
   112            initializeMap(savedInstanceState)
   113        }
   114    }
   115
   116    private suspend fun copyAssetsToInternalStorage() = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
   117        for (fileName in mapFiles) {
   118            val destFile = File(requireContext().filesDir, fileName)
   119            if (destFile.exists()) continue
   120            try {
   121                requireContext().assets.open(fileName).use { inputStream ->
   122                    FileOutputStream(destFile).use { outputStream -> inputStream.copyTo(outputStream) }
   123                }
   124            } catch (e: IOException) {
   125                Log.e(logTag, "Failed to copy asset file: $fileName", e)
   126            }
   127        }
   128    }
   129
   130    private fun initializeMap(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
   131        mapView?.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
   132        mapView?.getMapAsync { maplibreMap ->
   133            this.map = maplibreMap
   134            configureUiSettings(maplibreMap)
   135            val styleJson = """
   136                {
   137                    "version": 8,
   138                    "name": "OSRS Map Style",
   139                    "sources": {},
   140                    "layers": [
   141                        { "id": "background", "type": "background", "paint": { "background-color": "#000000" } }
   142                    ]
   143                }
   144            """.trimIndent()
   145            maplibreMap.setStyle(Style.Builder().fromJson(styleJson)) { style ->
   146                val gameLon = arguments?.getString(ARG_LON)?.toDoubleOrNull()
   147                val gameLat = arguments?.getString(ARG_LAT)?.toDoubleOrNull()
   148                val zoom = 6.0
   149                val cameraBuilder = CameraPosition.Builder()
   150                if (gameLon != null && gameLat != null) {
   151                    val target = gameToLatLng(gameLon, gameLat)
   152                    cameraBuilder.target(target).zoom(zoom)
   153                } else {
   154                    cameraBuilder.target(LatLng(DEFAULT_LAT, DEFAULT_LON)).zoom(DEFAULT_ZOOM)
   155                }
   156                maplibreMap.cameraPosition = cameraBuilder.build()
   157                setMapBounds(maplibreMap)
   158                setupMapLayers(style)
   159                setupFloorControls()
   160            }
   161        }
   162    }
   163
   164    private fun configureUiSettings(map: MapLibreMap) {
   165        val uiSettings = map.uiSettings
   166        uiSettings.isLogoEnabled = false
   167        uiSettings.isAttributionEnabled = false
   168        val marginInDp = 16f
   169        val marginInPx = (marginInDp * resources.displayMetrics.density).toInt()
   170        uiSettings.setCompassGravity(Gravity.TOP or Gravity.END)
   171        uiSettings.setCompassMargins(0, marginInPx, marginInPx, 0)
   172    }
   173
   174    private fun setMapBounds(map: MapLibreMap) {
   175        val north = 85.0511
   176        val west = -180.0
   177        val south = -85.0511
   178        val east = 180.0
   179        val bounds = LatLngBounds.Builder()
   180            .include(LatLng(north, west))
   181            .include(LatLng(south, east))
   182            .build()
   183        map.setLatLngBoundsForCameraTarget(bounds)
   184    }
   185
   186    private fun setupMapLayers(style: Style) {
   187        for (floor in 0..maxFloor) {
   188            val sourceId = "osrs-source-$floor"
   189            val layerId = "osrs-layer-$floor"
   190            val fileName = mapFiles[floor]
   191            val mbtilesFile = File(requireContext().filesDir, fileName)
   192            val mbtilesUri = "mbtiles://${mbtilesFile.absolutePath}"
   193            val rasterSource = RasterSource(sourceId, mbtilesUri)
   194            style.addSource(rasterSource)
   195            val rasterLayer = RasterLayer(layerId, sourceId).withProperties(
   196                PropertyFactory.rasterResampling(Property.RASTER_RESAMPLING_NEAREST),
   197                PropertyFactory.visibility(if (floor == currentFloor) Property.VISIBLE else Property.NONE)
   198            )
   199            style.addLayer(rasterLayer)
   200        }
   201    }
   202
   203    private fun setupFloorControls() {
   204        val isEmbeddedMap = arguments?.getString(ARG_LON) != null
   205        if (isEmbeddedMap) {
   206            binding.floorControls.visibility = View.GONE
   207            return
   208        }
   209        if (maxFloor > 0) {
   210            binding.floorControls.visibility = View.VISIBLE
   211            
   212            // Apply font to floor control text
   213            binding.floorControlText.applyRubikUILabel()
   214            
   215            updateFloorControlStates()
   216            binding.floorControlUp.setOnClickListener {
   217                if (currentFloor < maxFloor) showFloor(currentFloor + 1)
   218            }
   219            binding.floorControlDown.setOnClickListener {
   220                if (currentFloor > 0) showFloor(currentFloor - 1)
   221            }
   222        } else {
   223            binding.floorControls.visibility = View.GONE
   224        }
   225    }
   226
   227    private fun showFloor(newFloor: Int) {
   228        if (newFloor == currentFloor || newFloor < 0 || newFloor > maxFloor) return
   229        val style = map?.style ?: return
   230        for (floor in 0..maxFloor) {
   231            val layer = style.getLayer("osrs-layer-$floor") as? RasterLayer
   232            layer?.let {
   233                when {
   234                    floor == newFloor -> it.setProperties(
   235                        PropertyFactory.visibility(Property.VISIBLE),
   236                        PropertyFactory.rasterOpacity(1.0f)
   237                    )
   238                    floor == 0 && newFloor > 0 -> it.setProperties(
   239                        PropertyFactory.visibility(Property.VISIBLE),
   240                        PropertyFactory.rasterOpacity(GROUND_FLOOR_UNDERLAY_OPACITY)
   241                    )
   242                    else -> it.setProperties(PropertyFactory.visibility(Property.NONE))
   243                }
   244            }
   245        }
   246        currentFloor = newFloor
   247        updateFloorControlStates()
   248    }
   249
   250    private fun updateFloorControlStates() {
   251        binding.floorControlText.text = currentFloor.toString()
   252        binding.floorControlUp.isEnabled = currentFloor < maxFloor
   253        binding.floorControlDown.isEnabled = currentFloor > 0
   254    }
   255
   256    override fun onDestroyView() {
   257        super.onDestroyView()
   258        mapView?.onDestroy()
   259        _binding = null
   260        map = null
   261    }
   262
   263    override fun onStart() { super.onStart(); mapView?.onStart() }
   264    override fun onResume() { super.onResume(); mapView?.onResume() }
   265    override fun onPause() { super.onPause(); mapView?.onPause() }
   266    override fun onStop() { super.onStop(); mapView?.onStop() }
   267    override fun onSaveInstanceState(outState: Bundle) { super.onSaveInstanceState(outState); mapView?.onSaveInstanceState(outState) }
   268    override fun onLowMemory() { super.onLowMemory(); mapView?.onLowMemory() }
   269
   270    override fun onHiddenChanged(hidden: Boolean) {
   271        super.onHiddenChanged(hidden)
   272        if (hidden) {
   273            mapView?.onStop()
   274        } else {
   275            mapView?.onStart()
   276        }
   277    }
   278}
   279
